Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: STA 3032 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic concepts and techniques of quality control; applications of statistics in industrial research; design of quality assurance systems; reliability engineering.

ESI4313 - Stochastic Methods for Operati.name: ESI4313 - Stochastic Methods for Operations Research

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Grades of "C" (2.0) or better in (STA 3032 and MAS 3105).

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduction to techniques of operations research involving probabilistic and stochastic models. Topics include stochastic processes (e.g., Poisson and Markovian processes, Queuing Theory, and Stochastic Programming).

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Application of empirical methods for industrial engineering problem solving.

ESI4628 - Decision Support Systems for I.name: ESI4628 - Decision Support Systems for Industrial Engineers

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Grades of "C" (2.0) or better in STA 3032 and COP 3223C.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Building data-driven decision support systems with Python. Basic decision support methodology and industrial engineering analytics will be presented for analyzing and modeling real-world IE problems.
